original_text: It is like this: A man takes a seed of the plant called mustard. He plants it in the soil. It is smaller than any other seed that people plant in the soil.
korean_text: 겨자씨 한 알과 같으니 땅에 심길 때에는 땅 위의 모든 씨보다 작은 것이로되

sentences.original_text: A man takes a seed of the plant called mustard.
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람이 겨자라는 식물의 씨앗을 가져옵니다.

sentences.original_text: He plants it in the soil.
It is smaller than any other seed
that people plant in the soil.
